title: ‘Little Drummer Girl’ Creates a World You Want to Dive Into | The Watch (Ep. 309)
description:
AMC created a three-night event by airing all six episodes of ‘Little Drummer Girl’ over the course of three nights, but was it worth it (1:16)? Plus a review of the first three episodes (19:59).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Read Chris Ryan’s review of ‘Little Drummer Girl’ here.
Read Alison Herman’s review of ‘Little Drummer Girl’ here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
